title: Jamie's cranberry spinach salad
ingredients: ['good knob butter', '100g (3¾ oz) flaked almonds', '1 (500g) bag spinach, torn', '125g (4¼ oz) dried cranberries', 'Dressing', '2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds', '1 tablespoon poppy seeds', '100g (3¾ oz) caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon minced onion', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '4 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '4 tablespoons cider vinegar', '8 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']
